title: NBA Finals, Kevin Durant, and Kawhi Leonard
itunes:title: NBA Finals, Kevin Durant, and Kawhi Leonard
description:
Colin believes the NBA Finals will end tonight and explains why it has been boring. More on Golden State Warriors F Kevin Durant's injury plus the news that he is playing tonight, and his thoughts on Toronto Raptors F Kawhi Leonard taking games off. Guests include Chris Broussard, Charles Barkley, Peter Schrager, and Mark Thompson. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
